tag.name: cftree
tag.help: Inserts a tree control in a form. Validates user selections. Used within a cftree tag block. You can use a CFML query to supply data to the tree.

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Name for tree control.

parameter.name: required
parameter.help: Yes: user must select an item in tree control No: they do not

parameter.name: delimiter
parameter.help: Character to separate elements in form variable path.

parameter.name: completepath
parameter.help:
Yes: passes the root part of treename.path form variable when cftree is submitted No, or omitted: root level of form variable is not passed; path value starts with the first node
For the preserveData attribute of cfform to work with the tree, you must set this attribute to Yes.
If you specify a root name for a tree item with cftreeitem queryasroot, that value is returned. If you do not specify a root name, CFML returns the query name as the root.

parameter.name: appendkey
parameter.help: Yes: when used with href, passes CFTREEITEMKEY variable with the value of the selected tree item in URL to the application page specified in the cfform action attribute No

parameter.name: highlighthref
parameter.help: Yes: highlights links that are associated with a cftreeitem with a URL attribute value No: disables highlight

parameter.name: onvalidate
parameter.help: JavaScript function to validate user input. The form object, input object, and input object value are passed to the specified routine, which should return True if validation succeeds; False, otherwise.

parameter.name: message
parameter.help: Message to display if validation fails.

parameter.name: onerror
parameter.help: JavaScript function to execute if validation fails.

parameter.name: lookandfeel
parameter.help:
motif: renders slider in Motif style windows: renders slider in Windows style metal: renders slider in Java Swing style
If platform does not support style option, tag defaults to platform default style.

parameter.name: font
parameter.help: Font name for data in tree control.

parameter.name: fontsize
parameter.help: Font size for text in tree control, in points.

parameter.name: italic
parameter.help: Yes: displays tree control text in italics No: it does not

parameter.name: bold
parameter.help: Yes: displays tree control text in bold No: it does not

parameter.name: height
parameter.help: Tree control height, in pixels.

parameter.name: width
parameter.help: Tree control width, in pixels.

parameter.name: vspace
parameter.help: Vertical margin above and below tree control, in pixels.

parameter.name: hspace
parameter.help: Horizontal spacing to left and right of tree control, in pixels.

parameter.name: align
parameter.help: * top * left * bottom * baseline * texttop * absbottom * middle * absmiddle * right

parameter.name: border
parameter.help: * Yes * No

parameter.name: hscroll
parameter.help: Yes: permits horizontal scrolling No

parameter.name: vscroll
parameter.help: Yes: permits vertical scrolling No

parameter.name: notsupported
parameter.help:
Message to display if page that contains Java applet-based form control is opened by browser that does not support Java, or has Java support disabled. For example: notSupported = " Browser must support Java to view CFML Java Applets" If no message is specified, this message displays: Browser must support Java to
view CFML Java Applets!
